org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services

Class TransactionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services.AbstractService
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.services.TransactionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionService

    @Component
public class TransactionServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements TransactionService
    This is part of the strawman implementation for Fedora transactions This service implements a simple Transaction service which is able to create/commit/rollback Transaction objects A Scheduled annotation is used for removing timed out Transactions
    Author:
    frank asseg

      • removeAndRollbackExpired

        @Scheduled(fixedRate=1000L)
public void removeAndRollbackExpired()
        Every REAP_INTERVAL milliseconds, check for expired transactions. If the tx is expired, roll it back and remove it from the registry.
        Specified by:
        removeAndRollbackExpired in interface TransactionService
